title: Independent Action
description: A brutal civil war blazes across known space and the BlacWolf mercenary armada is caught in the middle, fighting not just for pay but for payback. But when their enemy unleashes a deadly new weapon and their employers cannot react fast enough, the men, women and aliens of the BlacWolf know it's time to take Independent Action.A space opera in the grand tradition, the adventure follows the men, women and aliens of the BlacWolf mercenary armada as they fight against the biggest threat to occupied space: the humans out to claim it for themselves. The battles will be fought in deep space and on the surface of alien worlds, and if their zealous enemies weren't enough, they have the incompetence of their employers to deal with as well. When their enemy prepares to unleash an unconscionable weapon, they know the only option is to take matters into their own hands.
author: James  Latimer
